# next()

**Instance Method**

Default implementation of `next()` in terms of `next(isolation:)`, which is required to maintain backward compatibility with existing async iterators.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func next() async throws(Self.Failure) -> Self.Element?
```
title: next()
